meanings.definition: The curve traced by the end of a tangent to another curve as the tangent moves along the curve.
meanings.sent1: The evolute of the circle is a point.
meanings.sent2: She studied the evolute of the parabola in math class.
meanings.sent3: The evolute of the line decided to take a stroll.
meanings.sent4: The evolute of the curve danced gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The evolute of the shape was like a delicate flower petal.

meanings.sent1: He tried to evolute his plan for the project.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar will evolute into a butterfly.
meanings.sent3: She evoluted her ideas into a beautiful story.
meanings.sent4: The city began to evolute into a bustling metropolis.
meanings.sent5: The seed will evolute into a tall tree over time.
